forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
The early morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a soft clarity, a promise of sun peeking through the gentle haze that often wraps the city in its cool embrace. Today’s forecast predicts a mostly sunny disposition, with a high lingering near a cool 59 degrees, inviting a sense of calm as the west wind sways lightly, whispering along the streets. As the hours drift past, temperatures will ease back to a comfortable 57, perfect for those who favor a brisk stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment in one of the parks that fringe this urban landscape.

This moment calls for layers—perhaps a light sweater to ward off the morning chill, followed by a breezy jacket for the afternoon when the sun fully breaks through. The likelihood of fog is minimal, with only a remnant marine layer hinting at the coastline’s ever-present influence, lingering like an afterthought. It’s an ideal day to sip coffee at a local café while watching the city pulse to life or to visit one of the lesser-known galleries tucked away in an alley, their artworks echoing the city’s vibrant soul. As night falls, a clear expanse awaits, where the stars might shyly twinkle against the backdrop of the cool air settling in at around 47 degrees.
